page.title: 11CLUBS
page.content: In the hall a Playgroup is held two mornings a week and a Mother and Toddler group also meets there. A Youth Club is held one night a week and three age groups of badminton use the hall regularly on winter evenings. Other activities are a weekly Sunday School, a monthly meeting of The Church Women's Guild and a monthly meeting of The Women's Rural Institute Every Thursday afternoon, in the coal-fired reading room of the Library, the Social Club for Senior Citizens meets. The villagers fund raise a lot for this club to give them a dinner at Christmas and to hire buses to take them a summer time drive and treat them to high tea.
